title: Olle Axelsson
text:
Olle Oskar Axelsson (December 1, 1913 – September 15, 1980) was a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="bobsled">bobsled</a>der who competed in the 1950s. Competing in two <a href="Winter%20Olympics">Winter Olympics</a>, he earned his best finish of eighth in the <a href="Bobsleigh%20at%20the%201952%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Two-man">two-man event</a> at <a href="Oslo">Oslo</a> in <a href="1952%20Winter%20Olympics">1952</a>.
Four years later he finished 16th in the <a href="Bobsleigh%20at%20the%201956%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Four-man">four-man event</a> as well as 17th in the <a href="Bobsleigh%20at%20the%201956%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Two-man">two-man event</a> at the <a href="1956%20Winter%20Olympics">1956 Winter Olympics</a>.
He was born and died in <a href="Stockholm">Stockholm</a>.
